contentList.content: Sam's Misread Charm Necklace
When the Dungeon Master didn't know what the "Charm Person" spell did....
Witcher's Silver Longsword
Forged with silver from a falling star, a silver blade is an indispensable part of a witcher's monster slaying arsenal.
Aard
A cone of concussive force explodes from your palm, throwing opponents back.
Aard:Alt
You unleash a weaker wave of force around yourself, throwing opponents back.
Igni
A cone of searing flame shoots from your fingers, stinging nearby opponents
Igni:Alt
A concentrated beam of fire shoots from your fingers, scorching targets further away
Quen
A protective shield envelops you, absorbing incoming damage.
Quen:Alt
A stronger shield takes your full effort to create, shielding and healing you for incoming damage
Axii
A mild hypnotic spell confuses a target with your wiley charms.
Axii:Alt
A short, intense command forces an enemy to fight for you.
Yrden
You create a ward on the ground before you, slowing targets that wander in its proximity
Yrden Aura
Enemies within the aura are Slowed and Revealed
Yrden:Alt
You create a damaging ward instead, blasting trapped victims with magical energy
Heliotrope
The ultimate force to turn the tide of battle. You move like lightning to cut down your foes in a flash.
Witcher
Born of mutation and martial training, witchers are mysterious master hunters of beasts, spoken oft in fearful tones by the common folk.
Toxic Tolerance
To survive the Trials is to necessarily survive the worst poisons and toxins...
Lethal Precision
Through superhuman enhancements and brutal training, witchers have mastered the art of finding the weaknesses in their foes' protection...
